name: Find The Killer (Cyzeck)
description: You are a detective that has to scope out the killer, 1 killer, 3 people, choose wisely, your job depends on it! Gain reputation from correct convictions and lose reputation from incorrect convictions. get 100 reputation to beat the game and don't choose incorrectly, it may cost you your job. This game is made for the GMTK game Jam 2022, with the theme "Roll the dice". "Find the Killer" is based all on luck!
